Upon arriving at the island, they discover a pirate ship that has been stranded there for centuries.
The friends explore the ship and find a treasure chest filled with gold and precious gems.
As they are about to leave the island, they are confronted by a group of ghostly pirates who demand the treasure.
The friends use their wit and courage to outsmart the ghostly pirates and escape with the treasure.
They return to their home town as heroes, but the treasure remains hidden on the pirate ship in the sky.
